short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up your daily SEO routine, get one-click insights on any page you're on. Sprout is for marketers who take SEO seriously.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Ultimate Chrome Extension for Every SEO Expert and Web Developer: Sprout SEO Extension 🌱

Transform your Chrome browser into an SEO powerhouse with the newly enhanced Sprout SEO Extension.

Say goodbye to time-draining manual checks and hello to instant insights!

🛠️ One-click validate your page's schema markup directly in your browser with our innovative extension, while direct links to schema-type documentation empower you to enrich your site's metadata. Whether you're aiming for perfect structured data or seeking to ace Google's rich results, this extension is your new go-to solution.

Gone are the days of toggling between tabs and tools.

📊 Get a comprehensive view of on-page SEO elements plus Core Web Vitals at a glance – optimization has never been this straightforward.

🚀 Dive into detailed SEO analyses with one-click access to 18 essential SEO tools, from Google Search Console to Ahrefs, without ever leaving your page.

🔗 Fix faulty redirects post-migration with our archive.org CSV download feature, saving you hours of troubleshooting

✅ Instantly determine Indexability and Canonical status, which is crucial for SEO excellence.

🔗 Fix faulty redirects post-migration with our archive.org CSV download feature, saving you hours of troubleshooting.

👽 With Reddit's rising popularity in the SERP (on average, showing up 77% for all product review terms), you can view directly if your content is shared on Reddit and join the discussion, or start sharing your content straight to Reddit.

Why is this essential?

In the digital age, flawless technical SEO is not just a perk – it's a necessity.

It's the backbone that helps search engines easily crawl, understand, and display your content effectively, boosting your visibility and SEO performance.

New in version 4.1 🖼️
Image support! Optimizing images just got a whole lot easier! Our new Images tab gives you a comprehensive overview of all images on the current page, helping you identify optimization opportunities at a glance.

Sprout SEO 4.0: The Ultimate Content & Research Upgrade 🚀

We’ve listened, and 4.0 brings you three major new tools that make day-to-day content research a breeze. Say hello to:

Google Trends Integration – Get live Google Trends data directly in the search results. No more toggling back and forth; just instant insights to spot seasonal trends and activity spikes in seconds.

Location Changer for Google Search – View search results from any location to help you rank-check with ease, no VPN needed.

People Also Asked Extractor – Uncover, export, and build on PAA questions to enrich your content and connect with your audience better.

With a fresh visual overhaul and boosted speed, 4.0 is designed to make content research easier, faster, and a lot more fun!

New in version 3.6
Speed improvements 🏎️, incorporated a whole bunch of caching and async loading of external checks to improve the speed of the extension opening up and showing the data you're looking for.

New in version 3.5
Better robots exclusion checker 🤖, checking not only the meta robots tag, but also verifies the current page against the robots.txt and the x-robots-tag header.

New in version 3.4
Better sitemaps, remove breadcrumbs from the SERP, add position numbers to the SERP.

New in version 3.3:
Hreflang checker. Take a readout of a URL's hreflang tags, and then crawls them to assess if they back reference your current URL, together with an http-status check on the URLs itself to see if they are redirected to their final destination or give a straight http 200 status.

New in version 3.2:
#1 Link sections, showing all internal and external links. Ability to export them and highlight them on the page.
#2 Right-click-contextual menu to access most validation techniques straight from a simple right-click (schema validation, page speed test, SEO tools, highlighting of links)


Key Features:

1️⃣ On-page SEO analysis: What's the appearance of the website in Google SERP? Are there any on-page errors?
2️⃣ Instant validation of schema markup using the schema.org validator.
3️⃣ Quick checks with Google's rich results and schema.org validator for optimal SEO.
4️⃣ User-friendly interface integrated directly into your Chrome browser.
5️⃣ Time-saving and efficient, ideal for busy web professionals.
6️⃣ Instantly view all available Schema Types on a page
7️⃣ Export all Schema markup found on a page or each individual type so you can easily backup your schema or study what makes your competitors outrank you 🙃
8️⃣ See full headers of the page you're on, and the potential redirect path that took you there
9️⃣ Check how your content in shared across social platforms, and join the discussion on the most used social community on the planet (Reddit)
🔟 A quick and easy way to test the currently open tab with 18 of the most commonly used SEO tools (Google Search Console, Majestic, Ahrefs, Semrush, to name a few)
1️⃣1️⃣ Had a bad site migration? Download a CSV straight from archive.org with all the pages stored in their memory, saving you time to build that redirection map

Empower your SEO efforts with the Sprout SEO Extension 🌱.

Ensure your site's SEO and content is impeccable, enhancing your search presence and paving the way for rich, engaging search results.

Don't just hope your technical SEO is correct – know it.

Add the Sprout SEO Extension 🌱 to your Chrome browser today and take the guesswork out of SEO
